mdRecord.dcterms:title: Two Men and a Woman in a Living Room
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two men and a woman sitting cross legged on a couch in a living room in the first photograph, and a man and a woman sitting cross legged in armchairs with a man in between them sitting on a stool in the second photograph, undated
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
